group_1.textLeft: *Huff* *Puff*...
(I can't find the minions that took the @chocolate...)

group_1.textRight: You done?
You really think they'd just stay here and@lurk around?
After they went through the trouble to @steal it all?
They're obviously long gone.
Time's already up. You gotta get out of@here.
This whole dimension is unstable. It's about@to fall apart any minute.
You don't want to be here when that happens.@Unless you fancy being gnawed by a wormhole.

group_1.textLeft: W-wait a minute! I need to carry the others@out.

group_1.textRight: Leave 'em, they're not worth it. Sure, they @aren't dead yet...
…but they're bound to wither away and@die soon enough.
Takin' 'em with you is pointless.
Or you wanna fertilize your petunias?
There's way more effective stuff for that@than these folks.

group_1.textLeft: Y-you know, even I...
Even I will grow old and die when it's my@time!
That doesn't make everything pointless!
And, no, it's not obvious that I can't bring@their chocolate back, not yet!

group_1.textRight: What are you even saying?
I just told you, right? If you leave the@store without me...

group_1.textLeft: Only those who have the Chocolate of Fate@can get outside safely.

group_1.textRight: Yep, that's what I said. Hope you@remember how you got here...
Whoa, hey!!! What are you doin'?!

group_1.textLeft: Uh... I'm breaking you apart to share with@everyone here.
Why, is that a bad idea?

group_1.textRight: "Is that a bad idea," she says!
How is you trying to use your bare hands@to break me apart a good idea?!
At least ask first!
You're terrifyin'! Stop it with your crazy @shenanigans!

group_1.textLeft: *Sniff* I'm so glad Witches can't talk to@us...
I really am...
It's hard to break something that talks.

group_1.textRight: Stop trying to break me then!!!

group_1.textLeft: Oh come on! All of these people are @in danger.
You said they can't leave if they don't @have the Chocolate of Fate.
Will it work with a piece of someone else's?
Do you still work if you're broken?

group_1.textRight: You know, it's never happened to me, so@I honestly couldn't say.
I don't know if a broken piece of me would@work as a replacement.
Maybe you're right, and you'll end up@saving them.
Or you all might become best pals and then@DIE!
And hey! Let me finish! I'm goin' out of my@way to warn ya!
I contain your fate.
Think about it. You break me, you basically@divvy up your fate among them.
Get it?

group_1.textLeft: Is that bad?

group_1.textRight: Handing over your fate completely or@exchanging it with someone else...
By doing that, you essentially decide your@own fate.
But if you deliberately break your own fate,@your life will never be normal again.
And in your case, your fate is freakin'@outrageous!
So sure, go ahead and break it! What@could POSSIBLY go wrong?
This isn't just about you, understand?
Try to be a little more aware of how much of @an insane anomaly you are!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I understand now...

group_1.textRight: I'm glad you do. Make the right choice.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry. If you were stopping me for my@own sake, then I'm grateful.
Thank you.
But if you know me better than I do...
If you are my very own fate...
Then you know what I'm going to do next.

group_1.textRight: Don't.
*Sigh*
You stubborn nitwit!
I know you'd even give your own body@away, bit by bit, if it would help.
I know you're capable of it.
You'd tear yourself to shreds, if need be.
But even if you continue like that, it's@guaranteed that you'll fail one day.
And if that happens today, who can you blame@but yourself?
Some of those people don't even want@you to do that for them.
Besides, you trust others way too much.
What if I were lying? What would you do@then?

group_1.textLeft: If you were lying, I think you'd be telling@me something different...
Like, "Follow them outside, quick!" or@"Break me already!"
Something like that.

group_1.textRight: You're too clever.
There's no guarantee that this'll work out.
And if everything does go well, you'd@better get used to a half-baked life.

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad we were able to talk.
Goodbye.
What? What is this place?

group_1.textRight: Okay, now gimme ba― [chara:800100:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800100:cheek_0][chara:800100:motion_300][chara:800100:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:800100:lipSynch_1]Huh?

group_1.textLeft: N-no! It should be mushroom-shaped...[chara:300101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:300101:cheek_0][chara:300101:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300101:lipSynch_1]@Huh?

group_1.textRight: Umm... Where are the Witch's minions?

group_1.textLeft: Quick! Leave the store as fast as you can!
And whatever you do, don't let go of the@chocolate that you're holding!
(The Chocolate of Fate melted away the@moment we all went out, without a trace...)

group_1.textRight: That was a close call...
Without you, Madoka, we'd be left crushed@in that dimension right about now.
We owe you our lives.

group_1.textLeft: Don't say that.
You girls have helped me out like that, too!

group_1.textRight: Huh? Why did I come all the way here?

group_1.textLeft: I don't remember either... Maybe we came @to buy something.

group_1.textRight: That's a good question. What were we doing@here, anyway?

group_1.textLeft: What? But we were just...wait, huh?
That's weird.
I was just about to say something...
Anyway, why did the building suddenly@collapse...?
Wait, where's the building?

group_1.textRight: What building? Was there one here?
Oh right! We came here to buy ingredients @for the chocolates.

group_1.textLeft: Ah! I'd forgotten about that!
We gotta hurry and get them!

group_1.textCenter: And why am I all the way out here?
I wanted a new coat design...
So I went to find trendy mushrooms for@inspiration...
